name: ExoArmor
description:
Operate the ExoArmor defense system to shield 30 targeted cities from an increasingly complex invasion force of over 11,000 bombers!

Will you emerge triumphant?

Hone your skills with ExoArmor’s captivating single player, single touch game play. Each city is a self-contained battle against waves of bombardment that require fast thinking and faster reflexes. Surprises await you as the game unfolds and your opposition becomes ever more formidable.

YOU
• Great for short bursts of time or longer play sessions.
• Easy-to-learn, difficult-to-master – a gradual learning curve encourages advancement.
• Normal and Easy difficulty modes always available.

WILL
• Fluid, 60 frames-per-second, high-intensity action inspired by classic arcade space shooters.
• Ultra-fast restarts get you right back into the action.
• Optional challenges to sharpen your skills.

PREVAIL
• Internet-free, 100% offline – play anytime, anywhere.
• Enjoy the game distraction-free – no in-app purchases or advertisements.
• Supports all devices running at least iOS 9.3.
